#summary A tutorial on how to install and run Apache Tomcat Server and MySQL Server and deploy the backgammonator app.

  # Download and install Apache Tomcat from Downloads.
  # Download and install the two files for MySQL from Downloads.
  # Start MySQL and Tomcat.
  # (Optional) Rename the TOMCAT_HOME\webapps\ROOT directory.
  # Set the TOMCAT_HOME property in Eclipse->Window->Preferences->Ant->Runtime.
  # Execute the deploy target of deploy.xml with ant. This will:
    # Create the backgammonator libraries and move them in TOMCAT_HOME\webapps\ROOT.
    # Move the web.xml and jsps to TOMCAT_HOME\webapps\ROOT.
    # Move the necessary libs to TOMCAT_HOME\webapps\ROOT.
    # Move the MySQL driver to TOMCAT_HOME\common\lib.
  # It is better if you restart the tomcat service now.
  # Open http://localhost:8080/...
